description:
“Vehicle mounted weapon that can be installed in a S-E (Special Equipment) type mount. A powerful special weapon capable of inflicting flame-based damage, particularly rare and valuable in the early stages of the game”

*After downloading, this DLC item can be obtained by travelling to the map location 'Undersea Tunnel'.

To use this content, you will need to have purchased the full version of the game. Please update your software before use.
name: Amazon Typhoon
